attributes.review: The app was an absolute nightmare to figure out. First of all, the downloading process took ages- at least 30 minutes! Once the app finally installed, however, it crashed as soon as I tried to open it! I had to delete 2 of my other apps on my phone to make room even though my phone indeed had enough storage! If that wasnâ€™t enough, the app itself was like a labyrinth. It was unnecessarily confusing to navigate and it would take up so much of my battery power and storage - more than the description of the app lets. It was a despicably horrid experience and I advise anyone who comes across this to click away and never look back! If this is anything to go by, Trumpâ€™s presidency is hopeless.
attributes.title: The worst possible app that could be used to advocate for a president
